movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception — planting an idea into someone's subconscious.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity’s survival.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of decency.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between a wealthy family and a poor household.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: The Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
